title: Definitions
context: [PART VI.] MEASUREMASTERS [ยง486-131] Definitions. For the purposes of this part: &ldquo;Certificate of measure&rdquo; includes a certificate of measure issued in compliance with this part, and shall be prima facie evidence of the accuracy of the amount shown. &ldquo;Public measuremaster&rdquo; means any person who performs public weighing. &ldquo;Public weighing&rdquo; means the weighing, measuring, or counting, upon request, of vehicles, property, produce, commodities, or articles other than those that the weigher or the weigher&rsquo;s employer, if any, is either buying or selling. &ldquo;Vehicle&rdquo; means any device in, upon, or by which any property, produce, commodity, or article is or may be transported or drawn. [L 1991, c 153, pt of ยง7]
